title: Waterdeep Building
description: A building in the city of Waterdeep.

type.description: The type of building, such as a tavern, shop, or residence.

cityWard.description: The city ward where the building is located.

occupants.description: Who lives or works in the building? Who can an adventuring party expect to find inside?

hook.description: A hook to help game masters introduce the building into the story, such as a rumor about the building or a problem that the occupants are facing.

dallePrompt.description: A prompt to send to the DALLE API to generate an image of the building. The prompt should begin by asking for a watercolor and ink painting of the subject, then a sentence or two describing either the interior or exterior of the building. Do not include the building's name in the prompt.
